column2: Paris has finally been taken and is between good hands. However, there have been rumours of a warrior wandering around the duchy and claiming to be inhabited by the spirit of a mysterious legendary woman... Some claim she is inhabited by the Virgin Mary, others by Marianne herself, or even a mysterious lady that took part in a rebellion to overthrow the Parisian government a long time before the Event... The local population is in awe and has joined her banners, willing to liberate the ÃŽle de France.
Dear [Prev.GetName], I am hereby solemnly asking to join me in my campaign to liberate the Holy City of Paris by giving me your assitance, your wisdom and your troops.
An urgent matter indeed it seems... I will send a detachment right away!
I have more important matters to attend.

The Great Jeanne has succeeded in her divine mission to liberate Paris, but the situation seems to have snowballed: indeed, she is now claiming to be the rightful ruler of a number of duchies which she wishes to liberate from heathen influence.
